Archeotech Laspistol.description: Known as a Lasrod or Gelt Gun, this pistol is an ancient design of Laspistol with much greater range and power.

Combat Knife.description: More of a sword than a knife proper, this tough and thick blade becomes a deadly weapon in the hand of an Astartes.

Sarissa.description: A vicious combat attachment that is attached to Bolters, in order to allow them to be used in melee combat.

Chainsword.description: A standard Chainsword. It is popular among Assault Marines due to the raw power, even with multiple opponents.

Chainaxe.description: Able to be dual-wielded. A weapon most frequently seen in the hands of Chaos, this Chainaxe uses motorized chainsaw teeth to maim and tear.

Eviscerator.description: An obscenely large Chainsword, this two-handed weapon can carve through flesh and plasteel with equal ease.

Power Sword.description: A preeminent type of Power Weapon. When active, the blade becomes sheathed in a lethal haze of disruptive energy.

Power Spear.description: This power weapon requires great skill to wield. When active, the blade becomes sheathed in a lethal haze of disruptive energy.

Master Crafted Power Sword.description: A master-crafted weapon is usually incredibly ornate and highly decorated compared to standard weapons of the same pattern, while also possessing augmented functionality. Any standard Imperial weapon can be master-crafted. Due to the improved design of a master-crafted weapon, it is more likely that a target will be hit by attacks from this weapon.

Eldar Power Sword.description: Power weapons, infused with arcane energy, are used by Howling Banshees and Dire Avenger Exarchs. Swords such as these are as much an artistic statement as a weapon and are effective against even heavily armored troops.

Power Weapon.description: Often the signature weapons of elite warriors, power swords are perhaps the most dangerous of melee weapons in the galaxy.

Power Axe.description: Similar to the Power Sword. Able to be dual-wielded. This weapon can be activated to sheathe the axe-head in a lethal haze of disruptive energy.

Power Fist.description: A large, metal gauntlet surrounded by an energy field. Though large and slow, it dishes out tremendous damage.

Lightning Claw.description: Lightning claws are specialized close combat weapons with built-in disruptor fields. These fields disrupt matter on a molecular level, tearing through armor and flesh with ease.

Dreadnought Lightning Claw.description: A specialized Lightning Claw variant designed for Dreadnoughts, these claws are capable of ripping through enemy vehicles and infantry with ease.

Thunder Hammer.description: This weapon unleashes a massive, disruptive field on impact. Only experienced marines can use Thunder Hammers.

Tome.description: Ancient Blades of various origins either through arcane forging or lost technique thes blades are beyond deadly.

Relic Blade.description: Ancient Blades of various origins either through arcane forging or lost technique thes blades are beyond deadly.

Master Crafted Thunder Hammer.description: The Master Crafted Thunder Hammer incorporates superior craftsmanship, advanced technology, and special modifications, making it more potent and effective in combat. It possesses all the qualities of a standard Thunder Hammer but with enhanced performance and additional features.

Bolt Pistol.description: A smaller, more compact version of the venerable Boltgun. Standard Godwyn pattern.

Webber.description: The Webber is a close-range weapon that fires strands of sticky web-like substance. It is designed to ensnare and immobilize enemies, restricting their movement and rendering them vulnerable to further attacks.

Underslung Bolter.description: A compact, secondary Bolter weapon often attached under the barrel of a larger firearm. It allows for rapid fire in close quarters.
An underslung Bolter attached to another weapon for additional firepower. It provides a burst of rapid automatic fire.

Stalker Pattern Bolter.description: The Stalker Bolter is a scoped long-range variant of the standard Bolter. Depending on the specific modifications made by the wielder, the Stalker Bolter can serve as a precision battle rifle or a high-powered sniper weapon.

Bolter.description: A standard Bolter, a 2-handed firearm that launches bolts of explosive material. It's a versatile and iconic weapon of Space Marines.

Heavy Flamer.description: A much larger and bulkier flamer. Few armies carry them on hand, instead choosing to mount them to vehicles.

CCW Heavy Flamer.description: A powerful close combat weapon integrated with a flamer. It's capable of dealing both flame damage and melee attacks.

Inferno Cannon.description: A huge, vehicle-mounted flame weapon that fires with explosive force. The reservoir is liable to explode.

Meltagun.description: A relatively quiet weapon, this gun vaporizes flesh and armor alike. Due to heat dissipation, it has only a short range.

Master Crafted Meltagun.description: A Master Crafted Meltagun incorporates superior craftsmanship, advanced modifications, and enhancements compared to its standard counterpart.

Multi-Melta.description: Though bearing longer range than the Meltagun, this weapon's great size usually restricts it to vehicles.

Plasma Pistol.description: A smaller version of the plasma gun, this dangerous-to-use weapon has exceptional armor-piercing capabilities.

Master Crafted Plasma Pistol.description: A Master Crafted Plasma Pistol incorporates superior craftsmanship, advanced modifications, and enhancements compared to its standard counterpart.

Infernus Pistol.description: The Infernus Pistol is a compact and portable flamethrower-style weapon. It unleashes a torrent of fiery promethium, which engulfs its targets in flames.

Plasma Gun.description: A 2-handed firearm that launches bolts of plasma. They are considered both sacred and dangerous, occasionally overheating.

Master Crafted Plasma Gun.description: A Master Crafted Plasma Gun incorporates superior craftsmanship, advanced modifications, and enhancements compared to its standard counterpart.

Sniper Rifle.description: Fires a solid shell and boasts powerful telescopic sights, allowing the user to target enemy weak points and distant foes.

Assault Cannon.description: A heavy, rotary auto-cannon frequently used by Dreadnoughts and Terminators. Has an incredible rate of fire.

Autocannon.description: A rapid-firing weapon able to use a wide variety of ammunition, from mass-reactive explosive to solid shells.

Missile Launcher.description: This heavy weapon is capable of firing either armor-piercing or fragmentation rockets. Has a low ammunition count.

Lascannon.description: A formidable laser weapon, this lascannon can pierce most vehicle or power armor from a tremendous range.

Conversion Beam Projector.description: The Conversion Beam Projector is a heavy energy weapon that harnesses advanced technology to project a concentrated beam of destructive energy. It is capable of cutting through armor, vehicles, and even heavily fortified structures.

Integrated Bolter.description: Integrated Bolter are a set of Bolter weapons that are integrated or built directly into the structure of the vehicle, armor, or Dreadnought.

Power Fists.description: While not quite as strong as two Power Fists, these artifacts allow the use of an additional, third weapon.

Twin Linked Heavy Bolter.description: Twin-linked Heavy Bolters are an upgraded version of the standard Heavy Bolter weapon, which is known for its high rate of fire and effectiveness against infantry and light vehicles.

Twin Linked Lascannon.description: Lascannons are powerful anti-armour weapons that fire highly focused and devastating energy beams capable of penetrating even the toughest armor.

Lascannons.description: Lascannons are powerful anti-armour weapons that fire highly focused and devastating energy beams capable of penetrating even the toughest armor.

Heavy Bolters.description: The Heavy Bolter is a heavy weapon that fires larger and more powerful bolt shells compared to the standard Bolter.

Whirlwind Missiles.description: The Whirlwind Missile Launcher is a vehicle-mounted artillery weapon that launches a barrage of powerful missiles at the enemy.

Twin Linked Heavy Bolter Mount.description: Twin-linked Heavy Bolters are an upgraded version of the standard Heavy Bolter weapon, which is known for its high rate of fire and effectiveness against infantry and light vehicles.

Twin Linked Lascannon Mount.description: Lascannons are powerful anti-armour weapons that fire highly focused and devastating energy beams capable of penetrating even the toughest armour.

Twin Linked Assault Cannon Mount.description: A twin mount of rotary autocannons, boasting an incredible rate of fire.

Reaper Autocannon Mount.description: An archaic twin-linked autocannon design dating back to the Great Crusade. Effective against a variety of targets.

Quad Linked Heavy Bolter Sponsons.description: Quad-linked Heavy Bolters are a significantly upgraded version of the standard Heavy Bolter mount; already punishing in a single mount, this quad mount is devastating against a variety of targets.

Twin Linked Lascannon Sponsons.description: Lascannons are powerful anti-armour weapons that fire highly focused and devastating energy beams capable of penetrating even the toughest armour.

Hurricane Bolter Sponsons.description: Hurricane Bolters are large hex-mount bolter arrays that are able to deliver a withering hail of anti-infantry fire at short ranges.

Flamestorm Cannon Sponsons.description: A huge vehicle-mounted flamethrower, the heat produced by this terrifying weapon can crack even armoured ceramite.

Twin Linked Heavy Flamer Sponsons.description: A much larger and bulkier flamer. Few armies carry them on hand, instead choosing to mount them to vehicles.

Twin Linked Multi-Melta Sponsons.description: Though bearing longer range than the Meltagun, this weapon's great size usually restricts it to vehicles.

Twin Linked Volkite Culverin Sponsons.description: An advanced thermal weapon from a bygone era, Volkite Culverins are able to ignite entire formations of enemy forces.

Storm Bolter.description: Compact, and double-barreled, this bolt weapon is inaccurate but grants an enormous amount of firepower.

Flamer.description: Blackened at the tip, this weapon unleashes a torrent of burning promethium - all the better to cleanse sin and impurity with.

Incinerator.description: This flamer weapon includes special promethium and sacred oils. It is particularly effective against Daemons and their ilk.
